updateElements.mainContentHeader: Your device will restart during this update
updateElements.mainContentSubHeader: Updates can take around 10 to 45 minutes to complete.
updateElements.mainContentText:
Please save any work and close all applications before updating.

If you do not update by the due date, you will effectively be locked out of your system until you complete the update.

While the update has been rigorously tested it's advised you do this as soon as possible to avoid any downtime, as well as help us find any issues early on with the update.

To begin the update, simply click on the Update Device button and follow the prompts.
updateElements.mainHeader: Your device requires a macOS Security Update
updateElements.subHeader: A friendly reminder from your tech team
